item.title: Code Halos are the key to achieving success in business, according to Cognizant
item.description: Cognizant Technology Solutions claims that the most successful businesses are using a new concept called “Code Halo” to gain a competitive advantage. This concept revolves around leveraging digital data, such as clicks, swipes, likes, purchases, comments, and searches, to understand individual preferences and behaviors. Source: Cognizant. Roehrig. Paul Roehrig, Global Managing Director of Cognizantâ€™s Center for the Future of Work and co-author of Code Halos: How the Digital Lives of People, Things, and Organizations are Changing the Rules of Business, highlights how businesses can utilize this “Code Halo” thinking.
